item.title: Robin add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "You - you alone will have the stars as no one else has them...In one of the stars I shall be living. In one of them I shall be laughing. And so it will be as if all the stars were laughing, when you look at the sky at night...You - only you - will have stars that can laugh." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Robin add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "What saves a man is to take a step. Then another step." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Robin add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "I know but one freedom, and that is the freedom of the mind." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Robin add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "But if you tame me, then we shall need each other. To me, you will be unique in all the world. To you, I shall be unique in all the world." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
